entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor app truncated on Mac #10911
  • Appsettings build error #10908
  • IOS Compiling Error #10907
  • FlexLayout Memory leak #10904
    Backlog
  • R8 : warning : Missing class androidx.window.extensions.WindowExtensions #10901
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Relative Path Handling #10898
  • Implict style for ContentPage not working #10895
    Backlog
  • OnIdiom not working when using as style resource #10894
  • Shell SearchHandler icon colors and sizes #10893
    Backlog
  • [Windows] System.AccessViolationException when closing window #10887
    Backlog
  • Android GoogleMap IsInfoWindowShown wrong value after InfoWindow is shown #10885
  • [Enhancement] Label Autofit Font #10884
    Backlog
  • iOS app fails to appear - dotnet MAUI "cute bot waving" never appears in iOS Window #10880

Closed

  • clang linker error after including Microsoft.Data.SqlClient nuget in project #10870
  • Install MAUI exe on server 2019 not seen the fonts #10899
  • Support for App Store Monetization Like StoreKit2 and Google Play Badly Needed #10853
    Backlog
  • Cannot create native types when deployment is executed to iPhone from VS for Windows without pairing to MAC #10800
  • [Bug] Deleting recipe causes nav bar change #3150
    .NET 8 Planning
  • TabbedPage Indicates Multiple Item Selection #6751
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Crash using Shell #7260
    Backlog
  • Setting Statusbar Translucent not working while using Shell #9250
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Extract Maps and Graphics docs during build #10909
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump analyzer for net7 #10892
  • Enable Codeql #10889
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Disconnect events and dispose the Content before close the Window #10886
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22521.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22524.2 #10891
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.6.1.1 to 1.7.0 #10890
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update .NET 6 workload version to 6.0.545 #10871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10879
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix more inline API docs #10785
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Add NeedsExactMeasure check for Editor on Android #10876
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
